events.name: Somatic Lab Loft Sessions
events.description: Facilitators, practitioners, and curious collaborators gather to explore and practice peer-led somatic work including breathwork, circling, and relational exercises.

events.name: Authentic Connection Circle
events.tagline: Open conversations in a safe space
events.description: An open table to connect in a safe public setting. Topics are fluid but may explore consent, communication, boundaries, relationships, intimacy, pleasure, and navigating desire with openness and curiosity.

events.name: Relating Games
events.description: Join us for an afternoon of playful authentic relating games designed to spark genuine connection, curiosity, and laughter. These structured games create a lighthearted container for exploring presence, vulnerability, and human connectionâ€”no experience needed, just a willingness to play. Enjoy beverages and treats from Ramone's while discovering new ways to connect.
events.price: One drink or treat to support venue
